record.title: AUTHORITY TO SIGN ENROLLED BILLS
record.narrative:
AUTHORITY TO SIGN ENROLLED BILLS -- (Senate - April 24, 2008)

[Page: S3411]

speaking.paragraph: I ask unanimous consent the majority leader be authorized to sign duly enrolled bills and joint resolutions through the recess or adjournment of the Senate until Monday, April 28, of this year.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
